name: Fridge Raid
description:
In the world where everybody had left the Fridge, only one hero stays.... THE MAGNET!  

Eggs, yogurt, vegetables... Everyone ran away. You must protect your kitchen kingdom, fight! Bravely defends the fridge from the invasion of magnets 🛡️

Fridge Raid is an intense game in which you have to defend your fridge from magnet invasion at all costs! To do this, repel the magnet enemies with your magnet. 

Be careful! If an enemy magnet is attracted to the minus pole of your magnet, you lose a life. You only have 3 lifes, play wisely!  Will you manage to last as long as possible? 

// How to play // 

W : Up

S : Down 

Space : Rotate 

The red pole of the magnet repels enemies


// Credits // 

Joyman: Programmer

Julien Rollin: 3D Artist 

Daniel Butler: Sound Designer & Compositor
